channel.title: Journal of Latin Linguistics
channel.description: A RSS feed containing the latest articles published in Journal of Latin Linguistics

item.title: From deceit to pain: Late Latin dolus and the interplay between semantics and analogy
item.description: Article by Chiara Repetti-Ludlow DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/joll-2023-2007

item.title: Future expressions in a sixth-century Latin translation of Josephus
item.description: Article by Chiara Repetti-Ludlow DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/joll-2023-2006

item.title: Iterative or stative? New morphosemantic analyses of Latin lūgeō ‘mourn’ and doleō ‘feel pain’
item.description: Article by Chiara Repetti-Ludlow DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/joll-2023-2004

item.title: Roman tablets as linguistic corpora: evidence for phonological variation in 2nd c. Latin
item.description: Article by Chiara Repetti-Ludlow DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/joll-2023-2005
